TopicTitle: Backspace doesn't target my ship after Mod Installs

Articles.Content:
Anyone run into this?  Where after installing mods, your backspace key doesn't reset your target back to your ship?  Anyone know how to fix it if you've run into it?

 

Thanks!
They changed it to ` or ~ in 1.2.2. What version are you on?

/facepalm.  1.2.2...  Thank you... 

I was trying... to be on top of things...  apparently, that excluded release notes...  *sigh*

Thanks again.
